programme.title: Masti
programme.desc: Three henpecked friends tired of their respective marriage decide to spice up their lives by indulging in an extramarital affair. But things go downhill very quickly when they become the prime suspects in a deadly murder case.

programme.title: Deewaar: Let's Bring Our Heroes Home
programme.desc: A group of Indian POW (Prisoners of War) from the 1971 Indo-Pak war rebels against the Pakistani army and tries to escape from their captivity. Helping the group in the mission is Gaurav, the son of a former Army Major also held captive by the enemy.

programme.title: Baatein Kahi Ankahi
programme.desc: Watch Baatein Kahi Ankahi with RJ Anmol In An Exclusive Interview With Bollywood Stars.

programme.title: Prem Kahani
programme.desc: Set during British India, this story follows the journey of a poetically-inclined Rajesh (Rajesh Khanna) living in a small town with his brother Brijesh (Trilok Kapoor), his sister-in-law and his niece. While Brijesh is actively involved in trying to force their oppressors leave India, Rajesh has no interest in politics. Things change when Brijesh gets killed, and Rajesh decides to avenge his death by becoming a freedom fighter. He also abandons his love, Kamini (Mumtaz) due to the fear that he might die during his struggle and leave her a widow. Kamini then gets married to Dheeraj (Shashi Kapoor), a police inspector and a friend of Rajesh. But when Dheeraj realises that Rajesh and Kamini shared a past relationship, he doesn't take the news well.

programme.title: Dil Kya Kare
programme.desc: Anand and Kavita are doting parents to an adorable child Neha whom theyâ€™ve adopted. Kavita hires a lovable young woman as a caretaker for Neha. But her life turns upside down when it is revealed that the woman is in fact Neha's biological mother while Anand is the biological father.

programme.title: Haan... Maine Bhi Pyaar Kiya
programme.desc: Pooja, a recent divorcee, takes up a secretarial job where love blossoms between her and her boss. However, when her ex-husband returns to her life, she gets caught up in a dilemma of choosing a person she left behind and a person she is falling for.

programme.title: Jab We Met
programme.desc: The life of a suicidal industrialist takes a sharp turn when he meets a spirited chatterbox on a train journey in this breezy Bollywood romantic comedy.

programme.title: Raja Hindustani
programme.desc: A young taxi driver and a rich city girl fall head over heels in love with each other. Defying her family, she marries him and relocates to his village. But her family weaves a web of deception to split them apart.
